DOC.brief_summary: To develop pragmatic migraine model investigator induce headache healthy volunteer patient migraine without aura phosphodiesterase inhibitor ( cilostazol ) . If headache responds sumatriptan , model use test new drug candidate .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Sumatriptan Placebo Cilostazol Induced Headache
DOC.detailed_description: There remain great need effective anti-migraine drug few side effect . Human experimental model valuable early phase development new anti-migraine drug useful model yet develop . The investigator ' group show Cilostazol , phosphodiesterase inhibitor induce headache/migraine healthy volunteer patient migraine without aura ( MO ) . To validate model , headache must respond specific migraine treatment sumatriptan . Hypothesis : Cilostazol induces migraine-like headache healthy subject MO-patients induced headache responds specific anti migraine drug ; sumatriptan . Aim : Developing pragmatic valid model test new anti-migraine drug .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy : Healthy subject sexes Age 1870 year Weight 5090 kg . Females request use effective contraception . Migraine patient : Migraine patient meet IHS criterion migraine without aura sex 1870 year 4595 kg . Healthy : Any type headache ( except episodic tensiontype headache < 1 day per week ) Serious somatic psychiatric disease Pregnancy Intake daily medication ( except oral contraceptive ) . Migraine patient : Any type headache migraine without aura ( except episodic tensiontype headache < 1 day per week ) Serious somatic psychiatric disease Pregnancy Intake daily medication ( except oral contraceptive )
